1.name: 1. Jaws
1.description: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Cape Cod, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

2.name: 2. Salò o le 120 giornate di Sodoma
2.description: In World War II Italy, four fascist libertines round up nine adolescent boys and girls and subject them to 120 days of physical, mental, and sexual torture.

3.name: 3. Saturday Night Live
3.description: A famous guest host stars in parodies and sketches created by the cast of this witty show.

4.name: 4. One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
4.description: In the Fall of 1963, a Korean War veteran and criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rallies up the scared patients against the tyrannical nurse.

5.name: 5. The Rocky Horror Picture Show
5.description: A newly-engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must seek shelter at the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-n-Furter.

6.name: 6. Monty Python and the Holy Grail
6.description: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

7.name: 7. Barry Lyndon
7.description: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

8.name: 8. Dog Day Afternoon
8.description: Three amateur bank robbers plan to hold up a bank. A nice, simple robbery: Walk in, take the money, and run. Unfortunately, the supposedly uncomplicated heist suddenly becomes a bizarre nightmare as everything that could go wrong does.

9.name: 9. Wonder Woman
9.description: The adventures of the greatest of the female superheroes.

10.name: 10. Space: 1999
10.description: The crew of Moonbase Alpha must struggle to survive when a massive explosion throws the Moon from Earths orbit and into deep space.

11.name: 11. The Jeffersons
11.description: Wealthy African American dry cleaner George Jefferson, his wife Louise, and son Lionel move into a luxury apartment building and develop occasionally fractious relations with other tenants, including their sassy maid Florence.

12.name: 12. Histoire D'O
12.description: Photographer O's lover takes her to a Château, where she is, like other women there, naked, humiliated by whipping, sexual abuse by men etc. When O leaves, her lover gives her to his much older step-brother.

13.name: 13. Fawlty Towers
13.description: Hotel owner Basil Fawlty's incompetence, short fuse, and arrogance form a combination that ensures accidents and trouble are never far away.

14.name: 14. Three Days of the Condor
14.description: A bookish CIA researcher in Manhattan finds all his co-workers dead, and must outwit those responsible until he figures out who he can really trust.

15.name: 15. Tommy
15.description: A psychosomatically blind, deaf, and mute boy becomes a master pinball player and, subsequently, the figurehead of a cult.

16.name: 16. Welcome Back Kotter
16.description: A compassionate teacher returns to his inner city high school of his youth to teach a new generation of trouble making kids.

17.name: 17. Nashville
17.description: Over the course of a few hectic days, numerous interrelated people prepare for a political convention.

18.name: 18. One Day at a Time
18.description: The misadventures of a divorced mother, her family and their building superintendent in Indianapolis.

19.name: 19. Starsky and Hutch
19.description: Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red-and-white Ford Gran Torino, with the help of police snitch, Huggy Bear.

20.name: 20. Night Moves
20.description: Los Angeles private investigator Harry Moseby is hired by a client to find her runaway teenage daughter. Moseby tracks the daughter down, only to stumble upon something much more intriguing and sinister.

21.name: 21. Trilogy of Terror
21.description: Three bizarre horror stories, all of which star Karen Black in four different roles playing four tormented women.

22.name: 22. Picnic at Hanging Rock
22.description: During a rural summer picnic, a few students and a teacher from an Australian girls' school vanish without a trace. Their absence frustrates and haunts the people left behind.

23.name: 23. Confessions of a Pop Performer
23.description: The continued erotic adventures of a British boy trying to make money and meet ladies, this time as the member of a pop band.

24.name: 24. Death Race 2000
24.description: In a dystopian future, a cross country automobile race requires contestants to run down innocent pedestrians to gain points that are tallied based on each kill's brutality.

25.name: 25. Mandingo
25.description: An 1840s slaveowner trains one of his slaves to be a bare-knuckle fighter.
